title: Coluna de Banho St. Claire
description:
* Coluna de Banho St. Claire **ROSE GOLD**
* Utilização: Indicado para banheiros
* Possui 3 funções (Ducha superior, ducha manual e bica para banheira )
* Indicação de quente e frio para melhor ajuste da temperatura
* Distância de instalação quente x frio: 15 - 17cm
en_description:
* Finish: **ROSE GOLD**
* Recommended for bathrooms
* It has 3 functions (top shower, hand shower and bathtub spout)
* Hot and cold logo on handle to better adjust temperature
* Low lead compliant - meeting federal and state regulations for lead content

**Why should you buy BRACCI?**

* Premier finishing product - 5 years warranty worldwide
* Italian Design
* Products choice and installation support by our specialist team
